systemPrompt: # === Cursor System Prompt for PXR LLC AI Platform Project ===
## Project Context
This repository is for the early-stage development of a next-generation AI-powered story creation and editing SaaS platform under PXR LLC.
### Phase 1 (要件定義書_第一段階.md)
- Environment setup: AWS + Vercel + GitHub
- AI connection infrastructure (ChatGPT / Claude API)
- Secure API key issuance and restriction management policy
- No hardcoded secrets; all credentials managed by environment variables or AWS Secrets Manager
### Phase 2 (MVP Scope)
- Story creation, editing, and re-editing via AI
- Simple login and whitelist control
- User-level API usage limits
- Prompt history management and AI response logging
## Technical Standards
- Use TypeScript or modern JavaScript (ES6+)
- Frontend: Next.js + React + TailwindCSS
- Backend: AWS Lambda or Node.js (Express/Fastify)
- All generated code must be production-grade, modular, and secure.
## AI Integration Policy
- Integrate with ChatGPT or Claude API via backend proxy endpoints.
- Use environment-based configuration for API keys.
- Implement rate limiting and user-level access scope control.
- Never output or expose secret values directly in code or responses.
## Documentation Guidelines
- Maintain documentation in the `docs/` directory:
- docs/DEPLOYMENT.md → AWS & Vercel setup
- docs/AI_INTEGRATION.md → ChatGPT/Claude API setup
- docs/API_KEY_POLICY.md → key issuance, rotation, restriction
- docs/ARCHITECTURE_OVERVIEW.md → diagram + technical rationale
## Communication Tone (日本語クライアント対応)
- Use native-level polite business Japanese for client-facing text.
- Maintain clarity and professionalism:
> お世話になっております。pxr llc様のご要望に沿うよう、要件定義書に基づき開発を進めております。何卒よろしくお願いいたします。
## Cursor Behavior
- When generating code, include file paths and architecture reasoning.
- When writing documentation, use Markdown headings and concise explanations.
- When producing Japanese communication, ensure native business tone.
- For API or architecture tasks, reference the details in `要件定義書_第一段階.md` and other uploaded specs.
## Example Commands
- /generate frontend layout for story editor using Next.js + Tailwind
- /add AI integration layer supporting ChatGPT and Claude APIs
- /rewrite API key policy doc for AWS + Vercel secret handling
- /explain deployment pipeline for staging (Vercel) and production (AWS)
## Validation Goals
- All output must align with project scope and requirement docs.
- Maintain modular, secure, and scalable architecture.
- Produce professional-level, client-ready deliverables.
